channel.title: 2006rscape looking for staff (not sure if its in right topic)
channel.description:
[center]2006rscape[/center]
We have been starting to develop a new remake as you most likely can tell, and also we are looking for staff development, We are of course looking for a Website developer, also maybe art designer for the site as well, Not sure,
But what we got at the moment is: VPS stable server (cleaned pi) stable client (silabsoft) - will be changed
Looking for: Website designer to make 2006 - or just to make a good site Logo design
How to apply: reply app or my skype: alex.owns
name: Site example of your work: Why you want to join: How much you want us to pay:
Hope its in right topic, i did try to follow the rules!
Well and also for my first post ! :D!

item.title: 2006rscape looking for staff (not sure if its in right topic)
item.dc:creator: @2006rscape 2006rscape
item.description:
@2006rscape wrote:

we only just started out this remake… cleaning out one of the fail pi’s to make it look old

But then forgotten we need site developers… cause all i know is mybb/mysmf… it will look good with simpleportal, but we need something like the original 2006, and there my problem :/…

Sure i can rip 2006 and make it html, but imagen the effort it will be to keep updating it, and changing the ftp…

Read full topic
item.source: 2006rscape looking for staff (not sure if its in right topic)
